document.description: Restaurants, diners and fast food located no further than 1/2 mile of an I-95 exit are listed here by state. These listing run the entire length of I-95 southbound ...
document.body:
Home Camping&RV Parks Lodging Outlet Malls Rest Areas Restaurants Theme Parks CityGuides I-95 Forums Highway Gourmet Great Overnight Stops Road Construction Real Time Traffic Tolls Gas Prices Travel Weather Milage Calculator I-95 Travel Links About Our Site Link To Us Advertise With Us
Restaurants, diners and fast food located no further than 1/2 mile of an I-95 exit are listed here by state. These listing run the entire length of I-95 southbound from Maine to Florida. For a complete listing of all I-95 exit services, including popular alternate routes, order our latest edition today!
Maine New Hampshire Massachusetts Rhode Island Connecticut New York New Jersey Pennsylvania Delaware Maryland Virginia North Carolina South Carolina Georgia Florida
